name: mira
text: A comment left by mira was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Aristagoras, tttt2, Panserbjorne)

name: cryptfiend85
text: This is what happens when you let Lie Bot teach a 5 year old otter how to cheat at poker. That's my theory, anyway.

name: saint
text:
I have a feeling that it is actually Cornelius and Teodor that are doing the cheating...

that box of tampons is a royal flush.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I think they are actually for stopping the royal flush

name: waldo913
text: gwowss.

name: tangles
text: avatar comment symmetry everybody! looky!

name: saint
text: I wish I could acheive that, but I am not for the chopping off of peoples' heads, personally .

name: radarjammer
text: Yeah something is fucked and busted up when this comment has chubbies in only two digits.

name: feets
text: You can see the receipt along the bottom edge of frame 3.  It is clearly not a card.

name: roastbeet
text: Great hats

name: mattylite
text: I imagine Teodor's as one of those green transluscently-billed bankers' hats.

name: magnolia
text:
A tampon receipt in a deck of cards? Obviously Lyle's doing.

(For some reason.)

name: happycat
text: I'd like to know who bought tampons in the first place. The hell?

name: rowboat
text: Mrs. Onstad?

name: lemnlime2
text: Yeah, exactly my thought!

name: wolfslice
text: The first laugh out loud strip of Achewood for this reader.

name: arcellus
text: Phillipe's hat..

name: qwerty
text: Someone has been letting Phillpe watch Limp Bizkit DVDs.

name: qatipay
text: A comment left by qatipay was marked as spam and excluded. qatipay: What a douche. (reported by Lacrimus, mira, Arcibi)

name: deimosrising
text: Foreshadowing: Lyle not only man douches, he man tampons.

name: abe
text: The fact that no females have as yet been introduced clearly supports this.

name: philosophe
text:
A portmanteau for you:

manpon

name: lux
text:
Let's play word nerd! Make a Spoonerism out of 'man tampon.'

(Answer: tan mampom. You lose 5 cool points if you knew that one.)

name: bron
text: Philippe should have bluffed.

name: ambala
text: Cornelius will not lie to a child.

name: nexus
text: Phillipe's hat.

name: old_odanger
text: b-boy hat! b-boy hat!!

name: killingthejay
text: RAP MUSIC, MY DROOGS!

name: f1shst1ck
text: "This might be the worst hand ever" I love that line

name: coldfrog
text: He was only in the hand because he was hoping for the draw.

name: tellumo
text: Philippe folds. He is so depressed that he is omitting his periods, all Roast Beef style.

name: partyfoul
text: haha you said periods

name: gouldgonewild
text: Isn't that Ben Folds' brother?

name: xnnyxcrucifiedx
text: This might have been my first favorite strip.  One I laughed about whenever I thought about it.  Even now, coming back to rate it.  Phillipe does not need tampons, also.

name: mystkmanat
text: Is mostly a thing of chicks.

name: melmaysmuckles
text: too bad phillippe couldn't get a couple more tampon receipts to fill out his hand a little

name: godfatherofsouls
text: onstad ever still use that ol NES font anymore?

name: relaxing
text: The text isn't even centered!

name: roomba
text: the otter makes a wise decision.

name: qeramah
text: Cheer up, Philippe, a backwards cap more than makes up for a bad poker hand.

name: synnah
text: I've just realised what a fantastic punchline 'I fold' is. And it comes after Cornelius' already-fantastic punchline.

name: lolsworth
text: It's not just the phrase, it's the combination of the phrase, the lack of punctuation, and the intensely disappointed look on the face of the five year old stuffed otter.

name: jawsh
text: You never fold with that hand!

name: rbisme
text: Phillipe can always bring the roflcopter out

name: coldfrog
text: This may be my most quoted Achewood strip ever.

name: cbtbone
text: Phillipe knows to fold with this hand.  He knows that is what to do.

name: zapatos
text: Chubby for sounding like the alt text.

name: cyberia
text: The expression on Philippe's face in the fourth panel totally sells this strip.

name: em2
text: THANK YOU FOR SHOPPING AT / SAFEWAY / BAKERSFIELD #3908 / 1 RST TRKEY...@$1.29/LB / 1 CHRISTN BROS...$10.99 / 1 NO-DOZ..........$6.99 / SUBT: $28.95 / TAX: @8.25% $2.89 / PAY: $31.34

name: griffypoo
text: Looks like someone was training for the Great Outdoor Fight.

name: expellens
text: Phillipe is so crest-fallen when told that receipts make bad poker hands

name: sparhawk
text:
Aw, Phillipe.

Don't give up.

name: nicejames
text: My friend's older brother used to have Magic: The Gathering patterned playing cards, so when you'd show him your hand of mountains and goblins, he'd show you his straight flush.  Classic.

name: robot_satan
text: Chuck Norris could win with that hand.  He once won a game of poker with only a 2 of spades, an 8 of clubs, a green 6 card from Uno, his driver's license, and a Get Out Of Jail Free card from Monopoly.

name: zapatos
text: He won with that hand, because his opponent had a two and a receipt for a box of tampons.

name: mattylite
text: I was wondering where that went.

name: gekimo
text: actually i think this is the best hand ever

name: kikineko
text: Wait a minute, who would even have a receipt for a box of tampons in this household?  I am now curious.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Even in these early days of the strip, the guys were rooming at Onstad's place.  There is a Mrs. Onstad.

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text: Still just Mr. Bear, though. Phillipe is so far the only character whose development really didn't change much.

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text:
well, Lie-Bot and Lyle haven't changed much either.

Hm.

name: atilla
text: I disagree. Lyle seems to be in a position of relative authority at first (offering rewards like cigarettes and a toy catalogue), and is rather polite, inquiring after Cornelius's mother, and is (apparently) never drunk. A far cry from the modern Lyle.
